content.description: Sit start the same as for Mighty Evan. Head left into the seam that eventually becomes a crack as it trends up and to the left. Finish as the crack expands into an alcove of jugs.
content.location: It ascends the main, overhung face (like the main chamber of a Lobster Trap).

climbs.name: Mighty Evan
climbs.fa: Pete Otis, quick 2nd by Tim McGivern

content.description: Sit start using good, angled crimps. Move up to the bulbous sloper, and continue to the spicy topout. Evan, the toddler, was cheering us on!
content.location: This ascends the right side of the main, overhung face.

content.description: Stand start at the overlap with a good, low foot. Make your way up to the next overlap where you'll find a couple of monos. Move to the flake above, and make your way right to a high topout! Fun!
content.protection: A pad and a good head.
content.location: A good place to get into the Lobster Trap is The Kitchen.

content.description:
This problem has two starts. They are both stand starts.  

  The first start is a few feet to the right of The Kitchen at a good, waist height rail. Make a difficult hand/foot match, and gain the good gaston up and right. 

  The second start is further right on top of a rock. Use the gaston hold as a sidepull, and get your feet onto the waist height rail. 

  Continue left, and join The Kitchen at the blocky hold near the flake.
content.location: Start to the right of The Kitchen.

content.description:
This huge boulder sits out in the middle of the woods near Rum Rock Lake. It sits near a slab with a bench made from lobster traps. There are two overhung sides and two slabby sides. There are some very hard lines on this boulder. One of the lines resembles The Darkling over in Town Line. It's also host to a couple really nice moderates on the overhung face, and easier slabs over on the other side. 

  To make things easier I threw names on the climbs that are just parts to a lobster trap. If someone knows the climbing history of this boulder I'd love to hear it and update the entries.
